EmailTemplate.name: Exam pass notification - FG exam
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You passed the Fundamentals of Geology exam!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You passed the Fundamentals of Geology exam you took on {!Education_History__c.Scheduled_Date__c}!
You may use the title “Geologist-in-Training” while you’re gaining your required experience.
Once you’ve gained your required experience you may register for the Practice of Geology exam.
Go to our Geologist examinations page for the exam application deadline.
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP011
